Sentient beings create karma.

The first is retribution in the present life. If one creates extremely good or evil karma in this body, one will experience it in this body. This is called retribution in the present life. The second is retribution in the next life. If one creates karma in this body and experiences it in the next life, this is called retribution in the next life. The third is retribution in a later life. If one creates karma in this body and experiences it in the second or third life after the next, this is called retribution in a later life. There are also four kinds.

The first is when the time is definite but the retribution is indefinite. This means that the time is definite and cannot be changed, but the retribution can be changed due to the karma. The fourth is when both the time and the retribution are indefinite. This means that the karma is indeterminate and therefore the time and retribution are also indefinite.
